chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: nat
Hp: p <> 0%nat
Hp': prime p
Hp'': (2 <= p)%nat
Hzero_one: Zp <> Op
l: list Z_Zp

Goal:
~ list_has_dup l -> (forall x, In x l -> x <> Zp /\ inv x <> x /\ In (inv x) l) -> Zp_lprod l = Op

Premises:
Zp_lprod = fold_right Zp_mult Op : list Z_Zp -> Z_Zp Arguments Zp_lprod _%list_scope
Notation inv := Zp_invert
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
list_has_dup : forall X : Type, list X -> Prop
Notation Zp := Zp_zero
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1%nat /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1%nat \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
Zp_invertible_prime : forall x, prime p -> Zp_invertible x < -> x <> Zp
Zp_invert_spec2 : forall x, x <> Zp -> inv x ⊗ x = Op
Zp_prime_invert : prime p -> forall x, x <> Zp -> {i : Z_Zp | i ⊗ x = Op}
list_has_dup_map_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (l : list X), (forall x y : X, In x l -> In y l -> f x = f y -> x = y) -> list_has_dup (map f l) -> list_has_dup l
list_has_dup_app_inv : forall (X : Type) (l m : list X), list_has_dup (l ++ m) -> list_has_dup l \/ list_has_dup m \/ (exists x : X, In x l /\ In x m)
Zp_invert_eq_not_zero : forall x y, x <> Zp -> inv x = y < -> y ⊗ x = Op
Zp_invert = let Zp_invert_full := fun x => let s := Zp_eq_dec x Zp in match s with | left Hx => exist (fun i : Z_Zp => (x = Zp -> i = Zp) /\ (x <> Zp -> i ⊗ x = Op)) Zp (conj (fun _ : x = Zp => eq_refl) (fun H : x <> Zp => match H Hx return (Zp ⊗ x = Op) with end)) | right Hx => let s0 := Zp_prime_invert Hp' Hx in let (i, Hi) := s0 in exist (fun i0 : Z_Zp => (x = Zp -> i0 = Zp) /\ (x <> Zp -> i0 ⊗ x = Op)) i (conj (fun H : x = Zp => let n : False := Hx H in match n return (i = Zp) with end) (fun _ : x <> Zp =>...
Zp_invert_spec1 = let Zp_invert_full := fun x => let s := Zp_eq_dec x Zp in match s with | left Hx => exist (fun i : Z_Zp => (x = Zp -> i = Zp) /\ (x <> Zp -> i ⊗ x = Op)) Zp (conj (fun _ : x = Zp => eq_refl) (fun H : x <> Zp => match H Hx return (Zp ⊗ x = Op) with end)) | right Hx => let s0 := Zp_prime_invert Hp' Hx in let (i, Hi) := s0 in exist (fun i0 : Z_Zp => (x = Zp -> i0 = Zp) /\ (x <> Zp -> i0 ⊗ x = Op)) i (conj (fun H : x = Zp => let n : False := Hx H in match n return (i = Zp) with end) (fun _ : x <> Z...
prime_in_decomp : forall (p : nat) (l : list nat), prime p -> Forall prime l -> divides p (fold_right Init.Nat.mul 1%nat l) -> In p l
list_hd_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X), list_has_dup (x :: l) -> In x l \/ list_has_dup l
list_has_dup_cons_inv : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X), list_has_dup (x :: l) -> In x l \/ list_has_dup l
list_has_dup_ind : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Prop), (forall (l : list X) (x : X), In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> (forall (l : list X) (x : X), list_has_dup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_has_dup l -> P l
list_has_dup_sind : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> SProp), (forall (l : list X) (x : X), In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> (forall (l : list X) (x : X), list_has_dup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_has_dup l -> P l
in_list_hd0 : forall (X : Type) (l : list X) (x : X), In x l -> list_has_dup (x :: l)
Permutation_in : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (x : A), l ~p l' -> In x l -> In x l'
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l)
Zp_prime_integral : forall x y, prime p -> x ⊗ y = Zp -> x = Zp \/ y = Zp
prime_algo : forall p : nat, prime p < -> p = 2%nat \/ (3 <= p)%nat /\ ~ divides 2 p /\ (forall n : nat, (3 + 2 * n < p)%nat -> ~ divides (3 + 2 * n) p)
Zp_lprod_cons : forall x (l : list Z_Zp), Zp_lprod (x :: l) = x ⊗ Zp_lprod l
Zp_invert_involutive : forall x, inv (inv x) = x
nat2Zp_choose : forall x, x = Zp \/ x = Op \/ x = ∸ Op \/ (exists m : nat, (1 < m < p - 1)%nat /\ 〚 m 〛 = x)
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
prime_factor : forall n : nat, (2 <= n)%nat -> {p : nat | prime p /\ divides p n}
map_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), map f ll = y :: m -> {x : X & {l : list X | ll = x :: l /\ f x = y /\ map f l = m}}
divides_le : forall p q : nat, q <> 0%nat -> divides p q -> (p <= q)%nat
prime_2 = conj ((fun lemma : 2%nat <> 1%nat <-> 2 <> 1 => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl_subrelation (2%nat <> 1%nat) (2 <> 1) lemma) (ZifyClasses.not_morph (2%nat = 1%nat) (2 = 1) (ZifyClasses.mkrel nat Z eq Z.of_nat eq (fun x y : nat => iff_sym (Nat2Z.inj_iff x y)) 2%nat 2 eq_refl 1%nat 1 eq_refl)) (let __arith : 2 = 1 -> False := let __wit := nil in let __varmap := VarMap.Empty in let __ff := Tauto.N (Tauto.A {| RingMicromega.Flhs := EnvRing.PEc 2; RingMicromega.Fop := RingMicromega.OpEq; RingMicromega.Frhs := EnvRing.PEc 1 |} tt) in ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker_sound __...
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
rem_diag : forall p : nat, p <> 0%nat -> rem p p = 0%nat
prime_decomp_uniq : forall l m : list nat, Forall prime l -> Forall prime m -> fold_right Init.Nat.mul 1%nat l = fold_right Init.Nat.mul 1%nat m -> l ~p m
